description: The second iteration of the A-Train series was released in July 1988 for the NEC PC-9801 and X68000. In the US, it was released under the name Railroad Empire.

Befriend fishfolk to expand your boat crews, take up arms against petulant pirates, and chart a course across an expansive watery world. Will you answer the call of High Adventure?

Drive over 70 powerful vehicles and overcome extreme open environments. SnowRunner's 4-Year Anniversary Edition includes the base game as well as the Year 1, Year 2, Year 3 and Year 4 Passes.

description: Discover a world of excitement and strategy with the Moto Rush GT, Train Traffic Manager, & Urban Flow Pack - your adventure awaits!

name: Dome RPG
description: "Dome RPG is a game about a boy who once woke up in a strange world. Explore a mysterious world with unique visuals, interesting characters and lots of mysteries to uncover!" (From Steam description)

name: Neon Intrusion
description: Become the ultimate agent in a world blending medieval intrigue with high-tech infiltration. Steal valuable treasures, assassinate targets, uncover hidden secrets and master the shadows. Augment your body to improve stealth, traversal and combat characteristics to become the ultimate killing machine

name: Guitar Maker
description: In the game "GuitarMaker" you play the role of a guitar craftsman. Build unique electric guitars. Develop your skills, choose the best wood and components, body shapes, varnish them and select electronics, to create perfect instruments. Gain recognition from customers and open your own music store.

name: Connected Hearts: Cost of Beauty Collector's Edition
description: Brand new story, same old techniques. Have you heard that the evil stepmother is a witch? Oh, sorry, now you know, and she'll want to get rid of you. Be careful!

name: Devil's Deck: Polar Night Falls
description: This content requires the base game Devil's Deck on Steam in order to play.

name: Karos Classic
description: The living legend returns in his original form! The Сlassic version of Karos, untouched by years and updates. Maximum level, sharpening level is limited.

name: Omapeli
description: Omapeli is an action RPG setting in a medieval fantasy world. Explore different biomes and enter underworld dungeons. Meet friendly NPCs, hear their quests and trade. Fully customize your character. Craft your weapons - swords, bows and magic.

name: Master of Ives
description: Join Jennifer and her Ive sisterhood in a quest to restore their roles as muses. Explore the Institute for Vital Energy, uncover potentials, and mend the lost bond between humans and these ethereal inspirers.

name: Train Simulator Classic: ÖBB 8073
description: Get ready to board the ÖBB 8073 from RSSLO for CityShuttle passenger services.

name: Out of Ore: Mine Decoration Supporter Pack
description: Furnish your mining office or enhance your game with trees and bushes. Now you have access to roadsigns, office furniture, barrels, building materials, and much more.

name: Meet Your Maker: Sector 3 Arsenal Pack
description: Meet Your Maker's Sector 3 Arsenal Pack introduces a powerful new weapon and an insidious new trap to your arsenal. Venture through the war-torn acid wastes, to Fort Hope, and witness humanity's failed attempt at preserving the planet's Genetic memory.

name: GlobeXplore
description: GlobeXplore Drone Simulator provides FPV drone flying on Google Earth. Enjoy lightweight operation, customizable sensitivity, and adjustable camera angles with 3D global views. Ideal for advanced pilots, the simulator continuously improves with user feedback.

name: Minion Masters: Mountain Song
description:
The Mountain Song DLC is a great +300% value bundle to empower your clan of Stoutheart! You also get a headstart in the Season Pass!

Includes:
- 3x Urclaw, Protector of the Peaks (Legendary card)
- 20x Frostberry Bearer (Supreme card)
- 20x Snap Freeze
- 40x Highland Huntress
- 40x Woodsman
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 3x Season Pass Tiers

name: Capital Fire
description: An action RPG that combines exploration with dynamic combat. Estrela is a young defender of democracy who searches for the Book of the Greater Law to put an end to a terrible threat from patriotic zombies.

name: Industry Giant 4.0
description: Build an industrial empire from scratch in Industry Giant 4.0. Produce goods, build up your industries, construct transportation networks, plan production, manage finances, and navigate global events. Become the next business mogul and write history!

name: Incursion2D
description: A fast paced action RPG where you will fight increasingly difficult waves of enemies, each with unique abilities! You will be fighting various bosses, work on your secondary skills, collect cosmetics for your character and work on your very own island!

name: Soul of Butterflies
description: Soul of Butterflies is a point-and-click adventure game with a unique worldview. Players will take on the role of Anders and explore an extremely enigmatic world. Amidst indescribable struggles and fears, they will gradually piece together the truth of this world.

name: Soul of Butterflies: The Lobby
description: "Soul of Butterflies: Incubation" is a point-and-click adventure game with a unique worldview. Players will take on the role of Anders and explore an extremely enigmatic inn as they unveil the world's hidden reality.

name: Master of Pieces: Jigsaw Puzzles - Cat Family Christmas
description: Experience the pure magic of Christmas through the eyes of a lovable family of red fluffy kittens in this enchanting tale of festive joy and heartwarming discovery! 34 picture!

name: Shop Tycoon
description: Buy, sell, and build the largest shopping center in the city.

name: Snezhinka: Sentinel Girls 2
description: A high-tempo shooter with simple controls. Enhance your character with cards and defend various targets as an employee of a private military company.

name: Loop Frogs
description: Guide two froggy friends through a pixelated, time-warping adventure. This 2D platformer will require you to master the time loop and leap your way across 30+ levels of hazards and puzzles.

name: Mr. Mueller's Grand Experiment
description: Live as the assistant to one of history's most remarkable figures: George Mueller, a man who witnessed orphans dying young in the streets of 1830's England and decided he would care for them, no matter the cost.

name: The Prisoning: Fletcher's Quest
description: After a visit to the psychologist that went horribly wrong you’re trapped in the mind of a game developer on the brink of physical and emotional burnout during the last stages of an intense project. Experience a metroidvania drenched in anxiety based on a very true story.

name: Pokini Kagura
description: Parkour around an abandoned city defending cute animals from evil monsters. Style on the baddies with expressive shmovement and customizable combos. Rebuild your hometown with the help of your friends and relax in a soothing hot spring.

name: Junklands
description: Embark on a journey to transform a polluted world shackled by its toxic overlords. Explore the lands, brave the environment, battle polluting foes and clean up a dying world in an epic 3D action-adventure metroidvania.

name: Requiem Reverie
description: Requiem Reverie is an immersive cooperative fantasy RPG that invites players to embark on an epic journey through a rich and expansive world filled with mysteries. The game places a strong emphasis on teamwork and strategic party mechanics, offering a deeply engaging and social gaming experience.

name: Chronicles of Lussaria
description: Forge through the story of Caynburn and save the country!

name: Joe is Not Lost: Jigsaw Landscapes
description: Follow the first adventure of Joe the cat, far away from home, in a unique and sweet Jigsaw Puzzle. What awaits you when you set the last piece?

name: Jupiter Melon
description: Go fast and avoid hazards as you hunt for artefacts to build out your deck.

name: Europa Universalis IV: Ultimate Sprite Pack
description: Upgrade the appearance of Europa Universalis IV with the Ultimate Sprite Pack.This pack includes 28 separate packs to add greater cultural and historical fidelity to the appearance of military sprites, as well as other attractive visual content on the map.

name: People's World
description: I really wish they would just fight without me. Turn-based adventure RPG

name: Project Moonborn
description: Unleash werewolf fury in an ultra-violent 2D roguelike action platformer while seeking to rescue lost pups and escape interstellar prison.

name: Dwarf Land
description: Embark on a journey in Dwarf Land, a procedurally generated open world. Master modular building amidst dense forests and towering peaks. Unleash creativity in crafting, hunting, and mining. Discover dwarven culture in a vibrant sandbox simulation. Dwarf Land awaits, a realm of endless possibilities.

name: Helix: Descent N Ascent
description: Helix is an adventure game taking place in a melancholic disembodied world. Combine your powers to solve puzzles and explore further and deeper.

name: The Rising
description: Step into the paws of a hybrid dog. Hunt, track trails, learn the city's daily routines, spy on humans, scan old recordings and documents. Uncover the truth and report to the Great Worm. SURVIVE.

name: College Kings 2: Episode 4 - Moving Out
description: Continue the story of College Kings 2, a radically raunchy choice-driven Adult Visual Novel. The SVC administration is furious about the increasingly wild activities of the college fraternities, and the boot comes down hard in Episode 4 - Moving Out.

name: Lost in Cairo
description: An open-world action-adventure RPG. You play as Soren on his journey through the desert to cure a rare mutation that prevents him from controlling his emotions. Explore a mysterious world where your actions impact your emotions, and discover what happens when you unleash them.

name: Pterodactyl Attack
description: In a world where the Earth is collapsing, help Rex, a fearless Tyrannosaurus, in a casual 2D platformer! Avoid deadly Pterodactyls and jump to escape. Vibrant HD graphics in an endless cycle of quest for survival.

name: My Confounding Cat is Criminally Cute!
description: A cute, wholesome yaoi / boys love visual novel about a grumpy wizard and... a black cat? Wait, what?

name: Fast Cars Small Islands
description: Build your island. Design your racetrack. Choose your favorite car and start racing. You will set the first time record for speeding around your racetrack. Will your friends be able to beat your record? How about other racers?

name: Sixtar Gate: Startrail - Oshiribeat Pack
description: Meet the collaboration pack between 「Sixtar Gate: STARTRAIL」 and multi genres creator group 'Oshiribeat'! This DLC includes a total of 7 new songs.

name: The Protectorate
description: The enemy is approaching. What's your strategy? In this fusion of Tower Defense and Autobattler, optimize the power of your turrets, create strong synergies and wisely choose your bonuses... Or your maluses! Will you be able to defend your city against the hordes of furious monsters?

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: NR Class Locomotive - JBR Indian Pacific Pack
description: The NationalRail NR class locomotive was introduced in 1996, and became the most numerous locomotive on the Australian railway network, used on both freight and long distance passenger trains. This pack covers the various Indian Pacific liveries seen from 2005 till the present day.

name: Trainz Plus: NR Class Locomotive - JBR Indian Pacific Pack
description: The NationalRail NR class locomotive was introduced in 1996, and became the most numerous locomotive on the Australian railway network, used on both freight and long distance passenger trains. This pack covers the various Indian Pacific liveries seen from 2005 till the present day.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: NR Class Locomotive - JBR Indian Pacific Pack
description: The NationalRail NR class locomotive was introduced in 1996, and became the most numerous locomotive on the Australian railway network, used on both freight and long distance passenger trains. This pack covers the various Indian Pacific liveries seen from 2005 till the present day.

name: Himitsu no AiPri
description: Himitsu no AiPri is one of two rhythm-based amusement arcade game releasing alongside the anime series of the same name.

name: Edge of Soul: Ragnarok
description: Echo of Soul is a free-to-play Massively Multiplayer Online Role-Playing Game with a fast-paced action combat, various character customizations and no subscription fee required. Travel the vast open world, compete in PvP modes, and explore EoS.

name: Resident Evil 4: Gold Edition
description: The Gold Edition includes the main game, the additional story mode Separate Ways, as well as the Extra DLC Pack, and is available February 9, 2024!

name: Healthy Hero: Tower Defense
description: Healthy Hero is a Tower Defense game where the player protects the hero from attacking junk food. You need to build and improve defense towers to stop the enemies. Levels get harder with new types of junk food and waves, but you can get items and improve towers. Be a real Healthy Hero and defeat the junk food!

name: AiPri Verse
description: AiPri Verse is one of two rhythm-based amusement arcade game releasing alongside the Himitsu no AiPri anime series. It features characters from all across the Pretty Series franchise of anime and games.

name: The Complex Tragedy
description: The Complex Tragedy is a single-player horror game set in a massive living complex. While exploring different areas, you will feel the fear as you uncover the creepy and deserted side of the complex. Brace yourself for spine-chilling experience within The Complex.

name: Battlefield 1942: The Complete Collection
description: Gear up and head out for the most explosive firefights online. From the opening battles of WWII to the brutal jungle conflicts of Vietnam, this is all-out war like only Battlefield can deliver.

name: Children of the Sun
description: Burning with anger, The girl wages a one-woman war against the cult, taking them down cultist by cultist, bullet by bullet, until she reaches her true target: the leader. Along the way she will unravel the dark truth about this mysterious order and the atrocities committed by them in the name of their master. In this tactical third-person puzzle-shooter you assume control of one bullet, guiding it through increasingly complex and challenging levels to kill cultists, trigger traps, and reshape the environment. Every shot counts and ruthless precision is rewarded. Taking down the cult is deeply satisfying; doing it with style even more so.

name: Akiya
description:
A wholesome game about exploring an abandoned traditional Japanese house with a new friend.

You play as a high school student, and your first summer job is to photograph an Akiya—also known as "empty house"!

Well, it looks like you've arrived... And a cute guy wants to tag along?

Upgrade your standard taxi or indulge in a sleek new ride, each with unique enhancements. Earn coins to buy additional cars or customize your current one, creating the ultimate cyberpunk taxi fleet.

The 10th character to join the TFH roster is Nidra the Tapir, a dream-eating stance character with nightmare mix-ups.

A lone Hunter stands against

name: Lingjing
description: Lingjing is a fantasy themed single player game developed based on Unreal Engine 5 with an open world 3D realistic art style. The game is currently under development and only open for testing applications. In the beta version, we only offer some content for players to experience.

name: Sacular Defense
description: ”Sacular Defense" is a real-time tower defense game in which you intercept enemies by placing circles around them to prevent them from hitting the planet in the center of the screen. Strengthen your turrets and defend your planet from the endless enemies!

name: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm
description: Evil aliens led by Lothor have attacked all the ninja academies as part of his diabolical plot to take over the earth. Only three students from the Wind Ranger Ninja Academy and two students from the Thunder Ranger Ninja Academy remain. Now these students from rival ninja academies must team up with the mysterious Green Samurai Ranger to save the world.

name: Dead Heat
description: Go head-to-head in this exhilarating arcade racing game by Namco. Race through four tracks based on real-life locations with eight customizable cars to choose from. Using the state-of-the-art PIN system, it can be stored to save your high scores and driving styles to be used as computer players for future races.

name: Chess Twist
description: A game of chess set on a procedurally generated board, where tiles can have 3 or 5 diagonals and straight lines bend around your opponent's defenses. Same rules, different battlefield. Opportunities for new strategies are hidden in plain sight. Will you see them before your opponent does?

name: Chick'n Mushroom Soup
description: Chick’n Mushroom Soup is an anime styled Visual Novel which you've been accepted into a culinary academy with sweet girls. Although you were a total asocial in the past, you now have an opportunity to change this.

name: Chompania
description: A 2D platformer that immerses you into the space adventure of Eddie, stranded on the quirky planet Chompania. It's time to jump, fight, solve, and conquer your way out of this pixelated space jam!

name: Christmas Corp
description: Christmas is here, and the only way for elves to produce enough gifts in time, is to be micro-managed ! In Christmas Corp, Santa's elves are burnt out, and need to be told what to do every second. The player has to manage each of the elves' schedules so that the toy production goes smoothly.

name: Christmas Rush
description: Christmas Rush is a racing arcade game in the warm atmosphere of a winter holiday. You drive a car at high speed, trying to avoid obstacles and reach the finish line in a limited time.

name: Circular Fever
description: A Classic 4-Key Rhythm Game - Easy to Learn, Hard to Master

name: Citadelum
description: Citadelum is a city builder set in legendary Ancient Rome. Build your own settlement, gather resources and evolve it into a magnificent city. Explore the world, trade and lead your mighty legions in epic tactical battles. Earn the favor of the Gods or challenge them, if you dare.

name: City Defense Z
description: City Defense Z is a strategy, city-building, and survival game where you place buildings with your cards during the day, construct your city by merging buildings of the same type, and defend against zombies attacking your city at night.

name: City of Graves
description: As a soldier in a lifeless city after a disease outbreak, fight creatures and hunt for what will save the city.

name: Classic Arcade Fishing
description: A masterpiece of classic arcade fishing shooting game with many expanded ways to play! Picture upgrade, explosion rate upgrade, welfare upgrade, everything upgrade! Super high gun magnification, super many bosses, super high magnification, super explosive, and make you rich in one shot!

name: Cloaked Protocol: Tactical Espionage Action
description: Dive into Cloaked Protocol: an electrifying retro stealth-action game. Outwit elite mercenaries with strategic stealth in a world of espionage, where every move weaves a gripping narrative.

name: Crystal Breaker
description:
Shoot the enemy at close range! Crystal Breaker is a vertically scrolling shmup that focuses on close range attack.

This game is an aggressive shmup where close range attacks and quick destruction are important for both stage clear and score attacks.

name: Crystal Heroes
description: A Fantasy RPG game using Match 3 for game mechanics instead of Dice.

name: Crystals
description: Crystals is a RPG game where you travel to another Dimension and have to fight multiple enemies using a turn-based combat system and avoid attacks like a platformer.

name: Cubebam
description: Is an exciting 2D physics game where the player has to help grandfather in a barrel break cubes and get to the coin. The goal of the game is to use the available projectiles, which can be obtained by breaking colored cubes.

name: CubeCubeRubik
description: CubeCubeRubik is a casual Rubik's Cube game with a simple and classic gameplay. If you are interested in the Rubik's Cube, want to challenge the limits of your speed or logic, or want your children to learn about the Rubik's Cube, you might as well give it a try.

name: CubeeRun Memories
description: CubeeRun Memories is a 2D die and retry runner, where the goal of the game is to finish a set of levels as quickly as possible. Opponents and obstacles may come in front of the player to add a little difficulty to each level.

name: Cube War
description: An action game in which we try to survive by killing enemies in space.

name: Creators
description: Creators is a first person shooter where users participate in massive battles either online or locally with AI. The game comes with a powerful in game scenario editor, ensuring that the only limit for what is possible is your imagination. Creators was meant to be fun above all else so enjoy!

name: Crazy module
description: This is a classic stand-alone casual puzzle game

name: Crazy Candydish
description: Crazy Candydish is a match -3 style puzzle game where colored pieces fall onscreen from 365 degrees and form shapes using 2D Physics. You must make matches and combos to earn bonus points. Earn points to move on through 75 levels.

name: Crazy Animal Choir
description: A casual game where you create music using various animal sounds. You can compose your own music, perform yourself, and manage your own choir.

name: Crayon Computer
description: Crayon Computer is a 2D physics-based open-ended programming puzzle game. (if you call that programming)

name: Crimson wind
description: Stephen, having inherited a sawmill, decides to sell it to fund a documentary about an unpunished murderer from his city. Little did he imagine where this decision would lead.

name: Crop and Claw
description: Crop and Claw is a classic-style JRPG centered around dragons in a lush realm known as the "Garden". The plantlife has gone awry, bringing a time of decline and stress across the realm. Return to the era of simple questing, dungeons, and progression.

name: Crowncity
description: Building and managing a late medieval city is a series of challenges. Build wells to provide drinking water, markets to provide bread and food, and theaters to collect performance tax. Stage mode continues an interesting story and journey, random map mode fills each game with a new experience.

name: Cursed Order
description: Indie story-rich RPG game in a world where humor and mystery intertwine.

name: Cursed sarcophagus
description: Cursed sarcophagus is an addictive 3D puzzle game where you have to lower sarcophagi on or off the island. In the game you will find many different levels and blocks that you have to destroy! Complete the game from start to finish, solving interesting puzzles!

name: Damn it!
description: Climb to the top with the help of marshmallows.

name: Dangerous adventure
description: Dangerous adventure is an adventure game with role-playing game (RPG) elements. You have to take on the role of a traveler who was shipwrecked and ended up on an unnamed island. Arm yourself with a magical staff and explore mysterious locations, get out of the maze, fight monsters in a dark dungeon!

name: Dangerous Fight
description: Welcome to the adrenaline-pumping adventure "Dangerous Fight" - an online shooter that will take you to the heart of the action in the atmosphere of the city of Yerevan, Armenia. You will go into epic battles where the technology of the future and the cultural heritage of the ancient city mix.

name: DangoVerse
description: Play as your favorite Vtubers from DangoFam! Engage in battles, explore, and clear your way through armies of mobs.

name: Daniel Pintado's Land Of Silence
description: Land of Silence is a Survival Zombie post-apocalyptic open world and open ending game, bringing back old school survival horror with modern touches. Managing scarce resources such as food, drink and ammunition.

name: Dark Bows
description: Embark on a mesmerizing journey through breathtaking landscapes and uncover the mysterious story of Princess Heila, which revolves around her quest to uncover the long-buried secrets of her family and kingdom.

name: Dark Energy
description: A 2D space action RPG with a slow and deliberate style, reminiscent of the Soulslike genre.

name: Dark Lessons
description: Can you survive your teacher in this psychological horror game? With only candles for light and trapped in her home, you have to uncover her family's dark secrets. Solve puzzles, connect the dots and escape. But beware: There is someone else playing games with you, and someone who needs your help.

name: Dead End
description: Use all opportunities to survive as long as possible.

name: Death Machine
description: Conquer the mechanical citadel in Death Machine - a metroidvania, with a roguelite item system. Gather items to gain strength, navigate the perilous machine world, leverage the aid of ancient demons, and seek out dangerous denizens to defeat before the forces of the machine close in on you.

name: DearMyFriend
description: Set off to the unknown world Stargather Land now. The shadow of chaos is shrouding here for so long, a girl from another world shoulders the responsibility of saving this land. Travel with the power of elements until the end of destiny, only fight will lead her to the finish.

name: Dear Edmund
description: Navigate a Victorian street under strict party rule. As Edmund, choose between personal gain and community health. Manage resources, upgrade your home and street, and face a dynamic environment. Your decisions will shape your destiny and the street's future.

name: Death Fighter
description: This is a simple side-scroller made by one person. It's my first game and I would really appreciate any reviews from you !

name: Death Penalty Hero
description: A fantasy role-playing game where you become an adventurer and move freely around the world, fulfilling the "righteousness" of each person's heart.

name: Deathpital
description: Survival horror in a scary hospital

name: Deathray
description: Immerse yourself in the eerie atmosphere of an abandoned laboratory with the effect of photorealism. Explore mysterious things, solve puzzles. But be careful, you are always being hunted.

name: Deep Down
description: Deep Down is a narrative roguelike deckbuilder about emotional resilience. Restore your relationships through card-based dialogues, express, transform and even repress emotions conveyed through cards, and confront buried memories to break the cycle.

name: Decurion
description: Combine the unique abilities of Mechs and Pilots in strategic synergy. Team up with friends in local co-op to conquer dynamic levels with different geometry, shaping your strategic approach. Watch out for anomalies introducing unexpected challenges as you defend your base and strive to stay alive.

name: Deep Among the Swarm
description: Deep Among the Swarm is a challenging survival RTS roguelite about surviving against thousands of enemies. Drill ever deeper underground while fighting the endless onslaught of the Swarm. Can you save humanity?

name: Deep in the Woods
description: The Deep Forest tells a classical tale of searching for family. Players will experience the changing seasons throughout the game and explore enchanting scenes depicting each season.

name: Deepmess
description: DEEPMESS is a turn-based tactics descent into the mind of god. Armed with a hammer and nail, tunnel your way through layers of flesh and bone while thinking one floor ahead. Dig deep and make mess through intense, god-lobotomizing fun.

name: Devil's Hideout
description: Devil's Hideout is a horror point and click adventure. Lauren learns from a mystic that her young sister is still alive, with cultists staging her death. Traveling to the hospital where her sister received care, Lauren plunges headfirst into a nightmare.

name: Devilish League
description: Swing, hit, and bounce! Blast enemies with your heavy bat in this hilarious cartoon roguelike!

name: Devastating Fog
description: Devastating Fog is a top-down survival shooter roguelike game. You play as one of the few survivors, whose goal is to reclaim the Earth from the fog. Fight enemies, craft and upgrade your weapons. Discover the deserted post-apocalyptic world where everything wants you dead.

name: Digitalter
description: Simple, zen puzzle game where you alter sequences of digits in columns and rows.

name: DitherDream
description: A trippy little exploration game. Let the world guide you through a strange and uniquely beautiful archipelago.

name: Dive The Depths
description: Dive The Depths is an action-roguelike set beneath the ocean's surface. As a humble diver, you must navigate the world filled with bizarre sea creatures, submerged ruins, and forgotten histories. Can you conquer the depths and unravel the secrets that hidden beneath the waves?

name: Divine Twins
description: Dual roles, open world adventure，be both hero and spouse.

name: Dirty Rotten Bounders
description: An original game, combining the strategy of Reversi with all of the excitement of a fun, fast-paced, tile-flipping, arcade action game. Jump player around the boards of 9x9 tiles, destroying chasers caught on flipping tiles. 15 boards per level, 3 levels of difficulty.

name: Eat the Rich
description: Be a billionaire, team up and betray your friends all at once in EAT THE RICH! A social party game for 6-10 players where you play mini games, vote out the competition, conspire to get ahead, all in a bid to be the richest!

name: Elementum
description: Elementum is a challenging roguelike dungeon crawler with elemental spells and bullet hell elements. Fight in multiple rooms defeating a wide range of enemy encounters, and by doing so, discover multiple spells and augments to craft your own build and playstyle!

name: Entropy
description: Step into a high-stakes, sci-fi FPS adventure where survival, base-building, and high time-to-kill combat merge in a dynamic, fully explorable spherical world.

name: Espionage
description: Espionage is a 2D narrative puzzle game. The story is set on an alternate history of World War II. You will be a spy deep within enemy lines, facing life-and-death trials and the choice between morality and duty in a series of operations, ultimately growing into a true revolutionary warrior.

name: Super Mario Land 2012
description: Sin descripción

name: Battleship
description: Sin descripción

name: McDonaldland
description: Sin descripción

name: M.C Kids
description: Sin descripción

name: Captain Willie
description: Ahoy there! Welcome to Captain Willie's crew! Join us on a maritime adventure as his trusty deckhand. Your job? Tend to routine ship tasks—chop potatoes, stoke the furnace, and keep the deck shipshape.

name: Pop Up Computer
description: An early, interactive CD-ROM title by Saru Brunei, who would later go on to develop titles such as Jungle Park and Cubivore. Was also slated for release on Apple's short-lived Pippin console, though it's not known if this version released.

name: Pongémon
description: Sin descripción

name: Sherlock: The Network
description: A game based on the Sherlock TV series.

name: Cornsweeper
description: Cornsweeper is a chill & whimsical, reimagining of a beloved classic. A meditative mind-sweep-em-up; pop delicious popcorn, avoid explosions.

name: Idol Time PriPara
description: Idol Time PriPara is a rhythm-based amusement arcade game, and the successor to the original PriPara game.

name: Winter Fragments
description: Winter Fragments is a cute slice of life visual novel with light yuri undertones about a couple of best friends set in 2001. It’s a nostalgic, sentimental story about the joys of creating: particularly when it’s done with a dear friend.

name: PriPara: All Idol
description: PriPara: All Idol is a rhythm-based amusement arcade game. It's the successor to Idol Time PriPara and the final PriPara arcade game. After it's end of service, it's still playable at Prism Stone shops around Japan.

name: Mountinuum
description: Sixth in a series of short sokoban browser games by the developer of Baba Is You.

name: Yandere no Sutoka
description: Yandere no Sutoka is a spin-off game by YandereDev and AMZE. The game is a parody of Saiko no Sutoka, a game by Habupain.

name: The Forever Labyrinth
description: Embark on an art-filled quest through time and space.

name: Physint
description:
Kojima Productions, in partnership with Sony Interactive Entertainment, during the State of Play presentation on 31 January 2024, announced a new espionage action game for PlayStation.

This new action-espionage game will use cutting-edge technology and a stellar cast to deliver an experience like no other. Blurring the boundaries between film and games, offering near life-like graphics and a new take on interactive entertainment.

name: Minecraft: Godzilla
description: It’s time to meet the king of monsters in the new Godzilla adventure world by Team-KYO and Impress. Select the Godzilla film you fancy best and engage in city-smashing fun. Play your way by escaping Godzilla’s wrath or even destroying the city as the blocky beast itself.

name: Slime
description: Aliens try to pollute the oceans with slime. Your task is to build barricades that prevent the slime from dropping into the sea.

name: Minecraft: Jurassic World Adventures
description: Step into a modern world learning to coexist with prehistoric dinosaurs in the wild. Play as one of five iconic characters as you learn to survive encounters with apex predators while helping to protect and rescue vulnerable dinosaurs. Discover familiar locations and vast new regions as you fend off poachers, collect samples, and unlock new mysteries.

name: Lo-Rez
description: A one level PICO-8 demake of Rez for the Dreamcast by Morgan Quirk.

name: Overnet
description: Forge a legendary legacy in this electrifying free-to-play Collectible Card Game where you can create your own characters, craft your cards to build perfect decks and engage in epic battles as you rise to become the supreme OverKnight.

name: Lazer Maze
description: Sin descripción

name: Cloudburst
description: Single screen shooter

name: Dreamslayer
description: Dreamslayer is an epic fantasy first-person hack’n’zap swarm arena game with retro styling. Defend your world from a Demon invasion from beyond the stars.

name: The Battle of Polytopia: Skin Pack 4
description: Skin Pack 4 includes the following skins: Ai-Mo To-Lï, Quetzali Iqaruz & Yădakk Ürkaz

name: MyGF: Another
description: A brand new game in the world of 'My GF Doesn't Know What I'm Into!' Discover new sides to the cast and enjoy the story from different perspectives.

name: DCS: P-51D Debden Eagles Campaign by Reflected Simulations
description: Some of the first American airmen to join the air war over Europe were the volunteers of the RAF's Eagle Squadrons. In 1942 they were transferred to the Mighty Eighth Air Force under the 4th Fighter Group, based in Debden, Essex.

name: MX vs ATV Legends: Husqvarna Pack 2023
description: Start your engines! Purchase the Husqvarna Pack and experience real off-road riding!

name: MX vs ATV: Legends - Compound Pack
description: Gear up for KTM RD Field & GOAT Farm! The original KTM proving ground offers two Supercross tracks and an all new Enduro experience. The Ricky Carmichael GOAT Farm is also included with three tracks plus a vastly enhanced freeride area. Ready, set, go!

name: Rings of Eden
description: Rings of Eden is an indie open-world RPG inspired by Souls-like games, that blends fantasy, science-fiction, adventure and satisfying combat.

name: Darklight
description: Are you ready to investigate a mysterious occurrence at a remote lighthouse? Solve all mysteries in this dark and eerie puzzle game.

name: Meet Your Maker: Sector 3 - Decayed Hope: Cosmetic Collection
description: Meet Your Maker's Sector 3 Cosmetic Collection is inspired by the battle of Fort Hope and the heroes who fought and died within the Bastion's bunker.

name: Scythe Machine
description: A fast-paced sci-fi / fantasy multiplayer action roguelike that requires balancing PvE with PvP. Use augments to gain new abilities and get stronger as you navigate your way from chamber to chamber to reach the end and take control of the Machine.

name: Hellspresso
description: Hellspresso is a fast-paced cooking game that combines restaurant management with strategic planning and development. Serve and clean tables, design your kitchen, discover new recipes, plan your menu, switch to your secret magic kitchen, gain the trust of your customers and unlock all their secrets!

name: Don't Starve Together: Starter Pack 2024
description: This Chest contains the playable character, Wurt: The Half-Pint, Wilson's Verdant skin set, Willow's Swashbuckler skin set, Wolfgang's Gladiator skin set, WX-78's Moonbound skin set, the Pastoral Chest, the Narwalrus Chester, and the Yawny Jammies Ensemble.

name: Last War: Survival Game
description:
A global zombie infestation has converted many into zombies. As a survivor, your primary goal is to retain your humanity and survive.

Begin your journey with an intense survival challenge. Dodge and combat waves of zombies. It’s not just about survival; it’s about quick reflexes and strategic thinking, as each lane presents unique obstacles and zombies!

Customize your base and expand your army – you are the light in this shelter, leading people towards a glimmer of hope. In this strategic game, your choices in building and developing your base will shape the future of your survivors in a world overrun by zombies.

Assemble your ultimate team by recruiting heroes. With a choice of three military branches, each hero comes with their own unique skills. Combine different heroes to easily achieve victory against the zombies.

In the challenging world of zombies, survival is a team effort. Partner with players from all over the globe to battle the zombies. Stay alert – alliances are complex, and not every survivor you encounter is friendly.

name: The Paper Arcade: Snake
description: In this game, you will control a cute little paper snake and guide it through a vibrant world of paper mazes and obstacles.

name: Mazemerizzz
description: Action! Adventure! DEATH! (Well, sometimes) Fun! Fear! Rewards! Puzzles! Traps! AND TORCHES! Jump, sprint, run and walk through various traps and obstacles. Use real time reaction to get past truly chaotic dangers. Interact with various puzzles to find the solution. Adjustable Third to First person.

name: OnePunch
description: Punch or be defeated, there can only be one outcome amidst this nonstop action! Match the timing of a string of never-ending sandbags to conquer!

name: Dungeon Slasher
description: Navigate a map filled with enemies, destroying all those who get in your way! Collect the spoils of battle, upgrading your character with what you find! Use a variety of character, artifact, and skill synergies to bring down the dungeon!

name: Extraordinary: Monster
description: Karena received an urgent mission: to hunt down Professor Selon who killed his wife and children. However, various signs showed that the matter was not a simple murder. Karena followed the clues to the abandoned Alberto laboratory, and the case actually led to a strange crystal Block - ENP

name: Do Not Feed the Monkeys 2099: Two Cage Seasoning Pack
description: Arriving on December 13th, this 1st DLC will be absolutely FREE!

name: Somniata
description: Uncover the mystery—turned nightmare—of a missing family in rural Massachusetts. A lone detective must survive the horror unleashed upon a family of four.

name: Of Dead Earth
description: Of Dead Earth is a third-person survival horror game set in Australian Outback.

name: Nebula Flow
description: Nebula Flow is a music game where you follow the melodic trail charted by your dog across colorful pixel art landscapes. Stock up on notes to power your canine companion to the end of each song!

name: Fernbus Simulator: Altano TX
description: Experience the Altano TX with three fully functional and intricately detailed variants, each offering numerous features for a unique driving experience.

name: Fernbus Simulator: Astromega
description: The Astromega - a top class double-decker that not only shines with its impressive design, but also offers generous space and comfort for a stylish trip across Europe.

name: Fernbus Simulator: Altano TDX
description: Two particularly outstanding variants of the Altano TDX with an incomparable feature for maximum travel comfort: TDX20, TDX21!

name: Giggly's Park
description: Giggly's Park is a procedural horror platformer, where the goal is to escape from a creepy giant playground before Giggly, the hollow clown catches you! A haunting creature that feasts on bad behaved children at his colorful realm.

name: Idle Champions: Mind Flayer Wyll Theme Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Wyll (if you don't already have them) Mind Flayer Wyll Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Wyll 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Wyll Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards

name: Ace of Jackpot
description:
Survive in a maniac casino by throwing your chips at the enemies to get even more. Bet on the slot machines to get upgrades and satisfy your appetite for fortune in this round survivor shooter game.

Become the Jackpot Ace!

name: Idle Champions: Mind Flayer Imoen Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Imoen (if you don't already own them) Mind Flayer Imoen Skin An Epic Feat for Imoen 7 Gold Imoen Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Idle Champions: Mind Flayer Viconia Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Viconia (if you don't already own them) Mind Flayer Viconia Skin An Epic Feat for Viconia 7 Gold Viconia Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: MWNeus
description: MWNeus is a sandbox focused on a single girl named Neus, who is your childhood friend.

name: Ceres Fauna: Seasons of Promise
description:
A Hololive fan game featuring Ceres Fauna of Hololive EN Promise.

Play as Fauna, who, upon waking up in an unfamiliar land, must find the other Promise members and find a way home.

name: Interstellar Inn
description: Interstellar Inn is a hotel building and management sim in space.

name: The Callisto Protocol: Biophage Skin
description: Wear the Biophage Skin Collection, a new cosmetic set for your player, weapons, and gear.

name: The Callisto Protocol: Gore Skin
description: Wear the Gore Skin Collection, a new cosmetic set for your player, weapons, and gear.

name: The Callisto Protocol: Snake Skin
description: Wear the Snake Skin Collection, a new cosmetic set for your player, weapons, and gear.

name: Immortal Emptiness
description: Immortal Emptiness is a first-person shooter with roguelike elements in which you get to navigate a deathless post-apocalyptic world and fight endless battles against nightmarish foes. Explore, fight and unravel the mysteries of a world where mortality is but a fleeting concept.

name: Missile Wars
description: Destroy or be destroyed. Missile Wars is a high-pressure arms race where players must defend their asteroid from enemy missile strikes while investing in crucial tech upgrades to gain the upper hand.

name: Forza Motorsport: 1985 Buick #6 Performance Motorsports Somerset Regal Trans-Am
description: Forza Motorsport 1985 Buick #6 Performance Motorsports Somerset Regal Trans-Am

name: Naraka: Bladepoint - Iris' Whisper Pack
description: Tarka Ji Legendary Outfit [Justice·Iris' Whisper], Tarka Ji Legendary Hairstyle [Justice·Hue]

name: Naraka: Bladepoint - Phoenix Princess Pack
description: Justina Gu Legendary Outfit [She Ethnic·Phoenix Princess], Justina Gu Legendary Accessory [She Ethnic·Phoenix Crown], Justina Gu Epic Hairstyle [Phoenix Song]

name: Naraka: Bladepoint - Gossamer Iris Pack
description: Valda Cui Legendary Outfit [Justice·Gossamer Iris], Valda Cui Legendary Hairstyle [Justice·Raptor]

name: Naraka: Bladepoint - Flying Squirrel
description: Grappling Hook Legendary Skin [Flying Squirrel]

name: Getting Canceled
description: Navigate through everyday office life at the marketing department of a mid-size soft beverage company in this visual novel.

name: Neon Auto Party
description: Build a party to auto-battle through waves of enemies in a futuristic fantasy setting. Each unit has its own deck of cards that determines their performance in battle. Find and buy items while leveling up units to take advantage of powerful synergies and reach the end of the dungeon!

name: My Sweet Floating in the Void
description: The game is a first-person puzzle adventure, with wacky and old-fashioned graphics, which will transport the player into a dreamlike, psychedelic world composed of an experimental game system that will challenge and test even the most experienced puzzle gamers in the industry.

name: Hollow: Cook Off
description: Stylish and Deadly shooterHollow: Cook Off is the mix of sidescroll shooter and stylish action.You are the quiet but skillful agent, Hollow. And you're going to infiltrate a mysterious factory.Shot, Cut, Float and make your combination.Fight quickly and glamorously but coolly.

name: Star Conflict: Baphomet. Weapons of victory
description: This pack includes:Active module “Ties of shadows”Weapon Missile module “Trinity”Unique modifier “Baphomet” shield recuperatorUnique modifier “Baphomet” pulse discharge60 monocrystalsA set of resources for 50 ores: (Vanadium + Silicon + Graphite + Osmium) + 50 Crystal shards.

name: Seas of Rebellion
description: Seas of Rebellion is an action-adventure rogue-like in which you'll explore the open ocean and fight back against the many forces seeking to invade your land!

name: Europa Universalis IV: Utopia Holy Roman Empire Music Pack
description: Inspired by the sacred aura and secular might of the Holy Roman Empire, this music collection from composer Utopia adds ten new songs to Europa Universalis IV.

name: Residential Crusaders
description: Residential Crusaders is an action-packed adventure fighting video game. Join Barry and Wallace as they team up to save the world from the space warlord, Mortifer. Experience fast-paced, intense battles as you fight through hordes of enemies to bring down Mortifer and restore peace to the world.

name: Session: Skate Sim - Year 1 Pack
description: Get all the game's additional content released before 31 December 2023 in a single pack, and find your new spots in 4 additional maps. Skate with Chris Cole and show off your style with exclusive outfits and skateboards.

name: One Military Camp: Christmas Season
description: Celebrate Christmas with our new free DLC for One Military Camp. Customize your base with armored snowmen. an inflatable Santa, Toy trains and many other decorative items. Build your camp, train your troops and carry out missions to defeat Dragan with a merry mood.

name: Boti: Byteland Overclocked - Hidden Giftware
description: Brace yourselves—winter has come to Byteland! Get ready to jump into a festive fiesta with 5 new winter island levels. Skate and slide your way into this new chilly chapter filled with slippery challenges all around the HUB area.

name: Oji-Mama
description: "Relying on someone else? That's just not possible." A young man, exhausted from working at a toxic company, decides to recuperate in the countryside. Supporting him is a kind and buff uncle. The uncle becomes a mama figure, healing the young man's body and soul with erotic healing powers!

name: ShadowStrikeVR
description: "ShadowStrikeVR" is a sniper-themed VR shooting game and an award-winning entry in the Qualcomm XR Contest.

name: Gatcha Gear
description: Gatcha Gear is a side scrolling platform game where players will face challenging levels while guiding our tiny robot through a series of portals, each leading to a new bizarre and colorful dimension. Immerse yourself in a strange world, challenges, and excitement!!!

name: Heretic's Fork: Inside The Fire
description: Dive 'Inside the Fire' with Disturbed: 7 Exclusive Character Variants and 4 Electrifying Tracks from 'Indestructible'!

name: Highrise City: Metro & Planes
description: Metro & Planes is the first DLC for Highrise City and builds up on the successful formula to create realistic cities with complex economy structures. It will allow you to optimize your public transport systems and to increase your trading capacities.

name: Neboslav
description: Neboslav is a relaxing roguelite action game. Using a jetpack, explore the procedurally generated, surreal world of floating islands. Defeat enemies and find epic upgrades! Win to reveal the strange history of the game world.

name: L'Île Archéo
description: Explore a strange island and discover the secret of the mysterious human civilisation. Restore artefacts and uncover the past in this serious game about ecology, archeology and what will remain after we are gone.

name: Gloaming Comedian Simulator: Scapegoath Science
description: "Scapegoath Science," the first DLC for Gloaming Comedian Simulator, plunges Barry Sazou into a comically chaotic world of the Mad Scientist. Survive another weekend in Transylvania making your way out of cheer jokes.

name: Saturn
description: Saturn is a tactical RPG set on the moons of Saturn and on Earth. The protagonist controls robots on the moons of Saturn and explores an underground city where one can find keys to the secrets of deep space.

name: Cursed Mansion: Rose Christmas Costume
description: New "Santa Outfit" DLC for the Cursed Mansion Game

name: Cymbalism
description: Cymbalism was a Flash, Shockwave and Java-based mixer game from Phase 1 that was available on the Korean Double CD of Gorillaz and on the Recording Studio of the Kong Studios website from 2001 to 2003. The game consisted of mixing tools to the Gorillaz song "19-2000" with multiple stems for the track. Also on the website were stems and samples available on other rooms for other songs as well, such as samples and sound files for "Tomorrow Comes Today", "Hip Albatross" and many others, and multitrack stems for two demo songs: "Hand Clapper" and "Gor Beaten", the second one being not fully released to this day.

name: Gorillaz
description: Released in 2001, this was the first album made by the band Gorillaz. In the package it was included a collection of games, wallpapers and videoclips.

name: Tank Ball
description: Tank Ball is a Popular Multiplayer game created by Maid Marian. The game features different rooms just like Sherwood Dungeon, and also features different team colors. It is most easily compared to the battle arena in Sherwood. Teams are identified by the colors red, blue, green, and white. The newest version of tankball is Tank Ball 2. Unlike the previous version, Tank Ball 2 has new power ups, landscape, and has patched up many hacks such as invincibility. The land features of the game are very similar to those of Sherwood, having similar rocks, trees, and water. The controls in Tank Ball are simple: use the arrow keys to move, and the ctrl key to shoot. Tank Ball does have a current problem with hacking.

name: Drop It
description: Drop It: Stack a delectable fruit platter! Combine fruits strategically for higher scores, but beware of the limited space. How many fruits can you fit before it spills out over the edge? Retry for a fresh shot at the High Score! Ready to taste victory? Drop in now and see how high you can stack!

name: Liminal Border Part II
description: Unfairly saddled with crippling debt after the events of Part I, Itsuki Ninomae and the gang turn to fellow student and daughter of a crime lord Kotoko Teshigawara for help. An intertwined web of loyalties and desire awaits as Itsuki, Kotoko and the others fight for justice.

name: My Little Universe: Xmas Character Pack
description: Make your experience more festive with 4 new characters!

name: Elise
description: Awakened in a bunker amidst a zombie outbreak after a car crash, guide Elise through harrowing challenges, solve puzzles, and face relentless undead hordes and uncovering the bunker's dark secrets

name: Cum Queens
description: Welcome to the captivating world of Cum Queens - an adult clicker game that will turn your life into an extraordinary journey through the galaxies of entertainment and unpredictable adventures!

name: Jinsei Owata no Daibouken
description:
Jinsei Owata no Daibouken is a side-scrolling Death Game based on memorizing patterns and overcoming unpredictable and irrational traps that will constantly cause the player's death, in a world built solely by ASCII art characters. In this action game developed by indie game producer King Soukutu, you control the character Jinsei Owata through stages that are very reminiscent of the style of classic Megaman.
TBAOOL also served as a great inspiration for the creation of other sadomasochistic games, such as IWBTG and Syobon Action.

name: A-Ressha de Ikou II: Shin Map
description: Add-on for A Ressha de Ikō II (a.k.a. Take the A-Train II). Includes maps for Australia, Nile River, Western Silk Road, Eastern Silk Road and Tōkaidō.

name: Backyard Buzzing
description: Backyard Buzzing is a strategy defense Flash game developed by FizzyMyDizzy and published on Kongregate on August 2, 2010.

name: A-Ressha de Ikou II: 5th Anniversary Special Limited Edition
description: Released to celebrate the 5th anniversary of Artdink and sold for a limited time. This compilation contains A Ressha de Ikō II and its New Maps add-on.

name: Time Tunnel
description: You play as a locomotive and have to collect all your waggons from several depots along the track.

name: Mr. Don
description: Guide Don, a brave pig through the levels and rescue the princess. Collect food and avoid the traps. Dont run out of time!

name: Mrs. Dynamite
description: Maze game

name: Itchana Tchones Zombie Terror
description:
In Itchana Tchones: Zombie Terror, it's Halloween Eve and the inhabitants of a small village are terrified by screams coming from a cave located in an old Indian cemetery. Those who entered the cave, to try to find out what was happening, mysteriously disappeared.

The city mayor then decided to call Itchana Tchones so that he could fight against this terror and return serenity to the village.

name: ShitMan
description: ShitMan - joyful meat pigeon bullet screen shooting game! The game will make you feel refreshed from start to finish, fighting and brushing! Meanwhile, It is also a joyful story about sudden death and the regeneration of a pile of feces. Life is indeed a pile of shit, but please be your own ShitMan!

name: A-Ressha de Ikou III
description:
Play the part of the head of a railroad company, with the aim of creating a railroad empire, providing a successful mass transit system that will be an inspiration to the rest of the world. Another goal is to provide the impetus for a chosen city to develop. There are a number of different places to set up business each with different layouts and existing houses and businesses.

The main money earners are passenger trains, that can be scheduled to pick up passengers at the times of day when the demand is high. However, in the long term you need the city to develop. This requires setting up trains that transport resources to where they are needed. These resources are used to build houses, and other buildings, increasing the number of passengers for commuter trains.

As the city develops, new businesses will spring up, such as stadiums, high rise office blocks, and ski resorts. The player may also build own businesses, the success of which will depend on the local population, the presence of competing businesses, and even the changes of the seasons, among other factors.

The stock market is also another way of making money. The player may also watch the seasons come and go, with snow visible in winter, and fireworks displays celebrating the New Year.

name: A-Train
description:
You play the part of the head of a railroad company, with the aim of creating your own railroad empire, providing a successful mass transit system that will be an inspiration to the rest of the world. Another goal is to provide the impetus for your chosen city to develop. There are a number of different places to set up business each with different layouts and existing houses and businesses.

The main money earners are passenger trains, that can be scheduled to pick up passengers at the times of day when the demand is high. However, in the long term you need the city to develop. This requires setting up trains that transport resources to where they are needed. These resources are used to build houses, and other buildings, increasing the number of passengers for your commuter trains.

As the city develops, new businesses will spring up, such as stadiums, high rise office blocks, and ski resorts. You can also build your own businesses, the success of which will depend on the local population, the presence of competing businesses, and even the changes of the seasons, among other factors.

name: A-Train
description:
You play the part of the head of a railroad company, with the aim of creating your own railroad empire, providing a successful mass transit system that will be an inspiration to the rest of the world. Another goal is to provide the impetus for your chosen city to develop. There are a number of different places to set up business each with different layouts and existing houses and businesses.

The main money earners are passenger trains, that can be scheduled to pick up passengers at the times of day when the demand is high. However, in the long term you need the city to develop. This requires setting up trains that transport resources to where they are needed. These resources are used to build houses, and other buildings, increasing the number of passengers for your commuter trains.

As the city develops, new businesses will spring up, such as stadiums, high rise office blocks, and ski resorts. You can also build your own businesses, the success of which will depend on the local population, the presence of competing businesses, and even the changes of the seasons, among other factors.

name: Garden Harvest
description:
It’s Spring and you have entered an amateur gardening competition with three of your best friends.

You each have received a small patch of land. Show us what you can do by having the largest harvest, and winning the competition!

name: Meteora's Mystic Merge
description:
Meteora's Mystic Merge is a puzzle game based on the famous Suika game. Instead of fruits, it uses a variety of VTubers as assets. It features currently only a new game mode with a playable character (namely Meteora) who has a special ability, and a classic mode coming soon, which plays a lot like the original though with some changes.

This game is similar to the cult game "2048" as well as "Suika Game" which is a switch exclusive.

name: Balls of Steel
description: The Balls are Back! The legendary 90s pinball game Balls of Steel returns to PC in all of its radical retro glory. Play through 5 classic top-down pinball tables: Darkside, Barbarian, Firestorm, Mutation, and Devil's Island. Not only that, we've added two BRAND NEW tables in classic BoS Style: Centipede, and Missile Command! Get 7 awesome retro tables in one package!

name: MLG Flappy Bird 420
description: A parody game of Flappy Bird based around MLG montage parodies from 2014.

name: Sword of Jade: Parallel Dreams
description:
An RPG made in OHRRPGCE.

After his fall from grace from the group that calls themselves "Protectors", Dogero questions his role in society. Ready to accept defeat, he is confronted by a long lost friend, who inspires him to keep his dreams alive.

name: Making The Leap
description:
Our first attempt at what we deem impossible seldom has the desired outcome. It is only through persistent effort and support that we can make The Leap.

'Making The Leap' was first created in Dreams for the Playstation 4, and has here been lovingly recreated for PC.

name: KKHTA: Security Watch - The Second Part
description: ​The sequel to KKHTA : Security Watch.

name: Possibility Space
description:
Possibility Space is a word game about exploring the possible outcomes of a conversation.

You will know you've experienced everything when the interface reads "100% explored". You can stop playing, or go back and read through the conversation.

name: Portal Returns CE
description:
A fan made "Portal" (2007) 2D platformer game, made for the TI-84 calculator.

Portal. Enjoy blasting through space at breakneck speeds and almost being fried, crushed, and insulted all for the hope of cake at the end. With 78 total levels, the fun will probably end at some point. But that is why there is a level editor to make even more mind boggling puzzles. So, good luck, and remember that GLaDOS is always watching...

name: Clockwerk
description: An unreleased game by Next Level Games which would have been about a pair of elderly Hausmeisters who take care of "the World Clock" named Otto and Herman, of whom just as they're about to retire have to stop some enemies from dismantling the said clock.

name: Hangman
description: Hangman was a Flash game playable on the McDonald's Pakistan website. The game was a playable version of the game hangman.

name: Labyrinth
description: Labyrinth was a Flash game that was playable on the McDonald's Pakistan website in 2010. No details about the gameplay exist, however it is assumed from the existing image that it was a maze game.

name: Strum
description: Strum was a promotional music game released by McDonald's Pakistan in 2010. The game was based on the band Call, who composed the 2010 McDonald's jingle for the region.

name: Burger Maker
description: Burger Maker was a 2010 Flash game released on the McDonald's Pakistan website. The game had the player create McDonald's burgers.

name: Nothing Together
description:
Nothing Together is a game that requires you to do nothing. If you act in the game, it's game over. All you have to do is be idler.
Multimode has two modes, Together mode and Battle Royale. In Together mode, up to 20 people unite to do nothing. In Battle Royale, you compete to see who does the least.

name: 3 Haikus a Little Guy Can Walk Around & Talk
description: 3 haikus a little guy can walk around & talk to is a memory that comes back to me occasionally, almost always in fragments that i can barely comprehend

name: Victor's Test Night
description:
Victor's Test Night is a first-person adventure game.
You have to explore each museum by day and by night, and find and report on anomalies not seen by day.
The game lasts 5 days, but it's actually 5 minutes and 55 seconds.

name: Rio: Beach Race
description: Sin descripción

name: Parallel Experiment
description: Dive into the secrets of the Parallel Experiment in this 2-player co-op puzzle game. Join forces as two detectives to finally catch the infamous Cryptic Killer. And remember - communication is key!

name: Dokopa
description: Dokopa is an online party game.

name: LOCKDOWN Protocol
description: A first-person social deduction game, combining real-time action and communication, 3 to 8 players. While most players will do their best to complete objectives and ensure victory, a small portion of dissidents will try to stop them at all costs, without getting caught.

name: Infinite Monkeys
description: The goal of the game is to write the entire first scene of the first act of Shakespeare's King Lear, one random letter at a time. Monkeys will type letters at random until one hits the correct one, and each completed letter gets you $1. Use the buttons on the top floor to hire more monkeys and motivate the existing ones to work faster by buying posters and banana trees.

name: Rock Canvas
description: On Rock Canvas, you are the artist! With the help of a variety of tools, create sculptures for Rocky's cave. But be careful, Rocky is a little demanding with his sculptures, he will tell you what tool to use for his next great masterpiece!

name: Infinite Craft
description: An endless crafting game.

name: 2in1
description:
Developed by Jeffrey Daniels for the BASIC 10liner Contest in 2023, this program contains two distinct games that play in succession.

UFO RUSH is a two key game. Evade collision using any two keys (some keys steer left, the others steer right). Recommended keys include: Z X C E R S F : ; / L

BOMBER is a one button game. Clear the skyline and land using any key.

It switches to Bomber when you score at finish the game with at least 4 points.

name: Wage Slave TD
description:
There is no hope in the days of overtime work, but the boss is always urging you? Come to "Wage Slave TD"!

Place various wage slaves with special skills to eliminate all kinds of weird bosses. You will also encounter a variety of random events, which lead to unique attack styles.

name: Crazy Ball
description:
Included as a type-in as part of CPCINFOS Issue 53 and 54.

During the game, you direct a ball onto a checkerboard.

The goal is to reach the end of each level, within the time allotted to you. You can direct the ball using the joystick, going left and right and pressing the fire button to make it jump. Please note, the number of jumps is limited (it is indicated at the top of the screen).

Each color of the checkerboard has a function: blue tiles have no effect, light blue tiles make the ball jump, red tiles slow down the ball, yellow tiles accelerate your ball, green tiles block commands, purple tiles reverse the commands and black tiles are, well, holes.

Falling into a hole wastes time. To abandon a game, press ESC, and you return to the menu

name: Touhou Tenkarou: Frantically Forbidden Fruit
description:
Touhou Tenkarou ~ Frantically Forbidden Fruit is a fan-made Touhou Project script for the Touhou Danmakufu ph3 shooting game engine, made by Gore of Re.Phantasmagoria of Imagine Breaker.

The gameplay combines elements from Double Dealing Character and Legacy of Lunatic Kingdom, with a few significant differences. It also happens to feature elements similar to that of Wily Beast and Weakest Creature. Like LoLK, the game has two gameplay modes—Paradise and Legacy—and stages and boss fights are separated in chapters.

name: The Great Math Adventure
description: The Great Math Adventure is a educational game created by 7th Level. Anthropomorphic kid bear Lil' Howie and his friends help teach the player about counting, number patterns, fractions, time, calendar and other topics involving math through mini-games.

name: Mumei ≠ Gura
description: Can you really claim to be their fan if you can't tell them apart?

name: Opsu!
description: Opsu! is an unofficial open-source client for the rhythm game osu!, written in Java using Slick2D and LWJGL.

name: Schrodinger's Cat Experiment
description: Schrodinger's Cat Experiment is a Brazilian indie game in pixel art that combines brain-teasing puzzles with enchanting aesthetics and feline charm. Dead or alive? The cat's fate is in your hands.

name: Special Delivery
description: Embark on an exhilarating puzzle-solving adventure as you transport a mysterious box through rooms filled with conveyor belts, pistons, and cranes.

name: Wagamama Fairy: Mirumo de Pon! Yume no Kakera
description: Wagamama Fairy: Mirumo de Pon! Yume no Kakera is an adventure video game which was was developed and published by Konami and released for Game Boy Advance on July 15, 2004 in Japan. This game is based of the Manga and Anime series Selfish Fairy Mirumo De Pon!.

name: Wagamama Fairy: Mirumo de Pon! Mirumo no Mahou Gakkou Monogatari
description: Wagamama Fairy: Mirumo de Pon! Mirumo no Mahou Gakkou Monogatari is an adventure video game which was was developed by Jupiter Corporation and published by Konami and released for PlayStation on March 20, 2003 in Japan. This game is based of the Manga and Anime series Selfish Fairy Mirumo De Pon!.

name: The Spirit's Destiny
description: Four adventurers are sent to search for the lost spirits and save the world from the evil wizard Zorgal.

name: ParaNichi: Magical Romance
description: A mobile otome game.

name: Sealed With a Kiss: Bride of an Asmodian
description: A mobile otome game by Otomedou and Abracadabra Inc.

name: Sealed With a Kiss RE: Bride of an Asmodian
description: A mobile otome game.

name: Kami no Machi
description: A PC visual novel game.

name: Nodame Cantabile
description: Based on the manga and anime of the same name, Nodame Cantabile follows the odd couple of Shinichi Chiaki and Megumi Noda. Both are students at the prestigious Momogaoka College of Music; Shinichi is a studious and strict conductor while Megumi is a pianist known for her loose and inventive playing style.

name: Thank You For Your Inquiry
description:
Welcome to Simplicity Transportation Customer Service.

Thank you for taking the time to contact us about your concern. Please create a new claim so that we can deal with your enquiry quickly. We promise, it will be short and simple.

Thank You For Your Inquiry is an interactive fiction game made with Twine where you try to get a compensation from a company after a bad experience.

name: Nodame Cantabile: Tanoshii Ongaku no Jikan Desu
description: A classical-music-based rhythm game, tasking the player with correctly tapping the notes flowing across the screen, with the DS's Stylus.

name: Hello Kitty Flower Bounce
description: A Hello Kitty mobile game.

name: Guilty Loving Boxing
description: A 3D boxing game featuring female! You can also play mixed gender matches! In addition to choosing characters and rules and fighting, you can also watch CPU vs CPU or train without being counterattacked! Enjoy boxing in various costumes and situations! *Note: This is a single-player game only.

name: Eternity's Child
description: An unreleased WiiWare Port of the PC game with the same name.

name: Titan: XCIX
description: Titan: XCIX is a first person adventure that takes place aboard the ill fated star ship of the same name. When an accident rips apart a lone ship on a routine mission, the crew find themselves fighting for survival and each other in a unique Single Player experience that's been in the making for the past two years.

name: Daikoukai Frontier
description: A pirate themed social game for mobile devices starring Ruby Heart from the Marvel Vs Capcom series.

name: Un-Seelie
description: Unseelie is a single player conversion for Half-Life 2 that engages the player in a third person action-adventure quest to save a magical forest overrun with evil Unseelie. Using the elemental abilities of fire and ice, the player beats back the Unseelie and their blight infestation. The player uses knowledge of the elements to pass through environmental puzzles and destroy enemies.

name: Mass Effect: Corsair
description:
An unreleased spinoff in the Mass Effect series that got cancelled due to high production costs for the DS game cartridge.

The game would have been a combination of the games Privateer and Star Control set "in a part of the galaxy that was more piratey and not really fully explored", and the player would play as an independent character that explores, collects cargo, and sells information to the Human alliance.

name: Flipside
description: You have just escaped from a mental institution. You’re on the run. The sun is shining, the birds are singing. You are jumping happily from cloud to cloud. You know that the only way to freedom is by reaching the ship at the end of the level. A cute bunny is jumping towards you, blocking your path. By pushing a button the whole world flips around and shows its dark side. The bunny is now an evil nurse who is trying to stop you from getting away. You headbutt her, clearing your path. With a push of the button the world flips back and shows its light side again. “Play FLIPSIDE and see the world through the eyes of a madman” FLIPSIDE is a platform game that allows you to experience the world from two sides. Pick a side!

name: Mega Man X8 16-bit
description:
A fan game made by AlyssonDaPaz. Bringing the original PS2 classic, MegaMan X8 back to it's 16-bit roots! Play as X and blast through a familiar yet fresh experience!

Mega Man X8 16-bit is a reimagining of the PS2 original with SNES styled graphics. The aim was to demake X8 in a similar feel to the first three Mega Man X games, while trying to actually finish a low-scope fangame. After two and a half years of development, version 1.0 was released in September 7th 2024, making the game fully playable from start to finish with X, but Zero and Axl are not featured in the game in any capacity.

In addition to the 16-bit graphics, the game differs from the original game by offering slightly different level designs at times, armor effects, and boss weapons.

name: Caution Ahead: Part 1
description: This is the first installment of a three-part series featuring a hide-and-seek type horror experience, with each part consisting of three chapters.

name: Inn Tycoon
description: Inn Tycoon is a relaxing and enjoyable game, offering you the opportunity to build, design, and manage your own inn.

name: Chase Me!
description:
This is a little game for the 2024 NOMAM's BASIC 10-liners Contest. This program fits in the EXTREM-256 category, and it was written using FastBasic 4.6 for the 8-bits ATARI XL/XE computers line

Collect as many coins as you can while being chased by some evil guardians.

name: PipeMaster
description: Connect the pipes using new items from stock (limited), or resue items on the field if available. Beware, you also have time limit!

name: Starlit Droplet
description: A star named Seirios is on a task to free their significant other, the moon Luneth. The path, however, isn't free from obstacles...

name: City of Bones
description:
City of Bones revolves around the exploits of detective Santiago de la Cruz in a peculiar city where conspiracy theories, urban legends, and ghosts have more truth to them than he'd care to admit.

With an uncanny ability to converse with the dead and predict misfortunes, he has long since grown used to the oddities of his home. Until...

name: Plop and the Penguin
description: Join Plop and his friends on their jourey to the North Pole,

name: Thanatos
description: Thanatos is a first-person psychological horror mystery game that involves finding clues, solving puzzles, and uncovering secrets to prevent a friend from taking their own life.

name: Cangaço Wargame
description:
Originally conceived as a board game, the developers realized during the development process that it was gaining many elements that are closely related to the dynamics of social games. That's precisely why the game was developed for Facebook.

In this multiplayer-focused game, you must lead a group of cangaceiros (bandits) in turn-based battles, navigating through farms, towns, and swamps of the caatinga (Brazilian northeastern region). The battles occur turn by turn, and a single combat can last from a few minutes to several weeks: you make your move and then wait for your opponent (who might be offline at the moment). There are two distinct groups in the game: the cangaceiros and the volante (police force). As you challenge and defeat your enemies, you climb the ranks, getting closer to the title of the cangaço king.

name: Age of the Ring
description:
11 unique factions full of new heroes, spells, and abilities. Hundreds of new maps. A brand-new campaign. A thoroughly reworked and expanded War of the Ring mode - and much more!

The mod aims to create an RTS experience that is faithful to the spirit of the Tolkien mythos, with diverse, engaging and balanced gameplay.

name: Krypta FM
description: Can you solve the mystery of the Beast of Gozdary?

name: Forgotten Hope 2
description:
An award-winning World War II mod for Battlefield 2, covering all aspects of land, air and sea combat, with a focus on realism and historic accuracy.

It is the sequel to Forgotten Hope, one of the most popular mods for Battlefield 1942.

As player, you can take control over an expansive number of authentic WWII equipment; from tanks such as the mighty German King Tiger, to famed aircraft like the British Spitfire, or hit the road with the Willys MB Jeep. Lay your hands on infantry weapons, such as the powerful German Panzerfaust or the fearsome American M1 Garand rifle. Fight your way through the North African deserts, the landing grounds of Normandy, the freezing Ardenne forests, and alongside your comrades in mother Russia!

name: Team Hot Wheels: Night Racer - Street Drift
description: Sin descripción

name: Team Hot Wheels: Night Racer - Dockyard Destruction
description: Sin descripción

name: Team Hot Wheels: Night Racer - Rubble Ruckus
description: Sin descripción

name: Code Wizard: Java Edition
description: An educational game to learn coding in the Java programming language. Compile real code to solve puzzles while working through an RPG style game.

name: Tuiterland 3: Tuenti - La Región Renacida
description: Three years after the events of Tuiterland 3, the region of Tuenti is starting to thrive once again, but even though there's still a path to traverse. There are tons of Tuenti inhabitants with troubles, and Prota and their friends are decided to help them all!

name: Half-Life: Blue Shift
description: An unofficial port of Half-Life: Blue Shift.

name: Mortal Kombat: Shaolin Monks - Unplayable Characters
description: Sin descripción

name: Mega Man X7: N's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Guitar Hero II: Deluxe - Brand New Hero
description: Sin descripción
